title: Raskel - First Platform for Waste Management
bannertitle: A Platform For Waste Management And Valorization
bannermsg: We solve the problem of environmental pollution and waste disposal by providing a platform to control and value waste, using the latest technologies and digital transformation, to help local authorities raise citizens awareness about the importance of combating environmental pollution, facilitating waste life cycle processes, and providing solutions to monitor the life cycle and manage data and statistics related to it.
theplatformtxt: We use Digital Transformation to deliver the best solutions, giving space to innovation with the latest technologies on the market.
customersmsg: We view customer differently, we understand the dynamics and networked ways they interact. We think about customers as a network.
valuemsg: We understand the rapid pace of change, so we continuously adapt how we serve our customers, what problems we solve, and what value we deliver.
competitionmsg: Rather than the view of bitter enemies, we see our interfirm relationships as a shifting mix of competition and cooperation.
innovationmsg: We experiment continuously and effectively, by continuously iterating and testing new ideas and by getting real data and real customer feedback.
datamsg: The data that is available continues to grow exponentially, Data allows us to continually experiment, learn, and test our ideas.
disruptionmsg: We understand that every industry faces a challenger that offers far greater value to the customer in a way we cannot compete with directly.
fastandsimplemsg: We rely on technology for fast delivery and simplicity taking into consideration services quality for a digital economy.
greenecomsg: To reach a green economy we believe everybody should join in.
teamtxt: A multi diverse, young, dynamic team that believes in hard work, innovation and social change that seeks a new digital green economy.
khaledtxt: Founder & CTO / IT & Digital Transformation Expert
notfoundmsg: Ooops! The page requested does not exist. Please check !
footermsg: Raskel is a pioneering project that aims to eliminate environmental pollution by using modern technologies and digital transformation. Find us on social media.
readystarted: Do You Want To Know More About The Platform?
